cat.albirar.communications.test

Class AbstractCommunicationsTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • cat.albirar.communications.test.AbstractCommunicationsTest
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractEmailServiceTest, CommunicationServiceTest

    @ContextConfiguration(classes=cat.albirar.communications.configuration.AlbirarCommunicationsConfiguration.class)
 @ExtendWith(value={org.springframework.test.context.junit.jupiter.SpringExtension.class,RabbitMqContainerExtension.class})
public abstract class AbstractCommunicationsTest
extends Object
    A convenient abstract class to derive to any test.

    1.0.0
    Author:
    Octavi Fornés <ofornes@albirar.cat>

    • Method Detail

      • normalizeCarriageReturnAndEmptyLastLine

        protected String normalizeCarriageReturnAndEmptyLastLine(String origin)
        Normalize text for change CR+NL by NL and removes last empty line. In some cases, the original text from email messages change new-line by carriage-return+new-line, and add a extra empty line at end.
        Parameters:
        origin - The original email text
        Returns:
        The text, normalized and without the last empty line.

      • normalizeCarriageReturn

        protected String normalizeCarriageReturn(String origin)
        Normalize text for change CR+NL by NL. In some cases, the original text from email messages change new-line by carriage-return+new-line.
        Parameters:
        origin - The original email text
        Returns:
        The text, normalized
